name: joyful autumn
description: This is a game uploaded for the Autumn game jam of 2021. w a s d to move and space to jump and esc to leave the game. Click on the leaves, pick them up and throw them away in the trash.  I will definitely be  working on this game more in the future. This is my first game jam and my first "released game" so it is kind of exciting. the 3d models and textures are not my own. got the houses from the unity asset store and the road and sidewalk textures from google.
